name: Space Trade Fleet 1.5
description:
Artificial Intelligence race has taken over our star system.

We have to build even trade into a heavily armed fleet.

Assemble the spaceship. Raise funds by transporting trade items.

A total of 10 planets should be funded to complete the colonial construction quest.

features :
- Automatic shooting system for lazy gamers
- A shooting game with a head, not a hand
- 7 space ship slots for fleet
- 5 different space ship hulls
- A total of 31 parts for assembling space ship
- 4 different super weapon parts for user's control
- A total of ten trading planets
- Each planet has three difficulties depending on the number of trade items it carries
- a total of 30 enemy stages that can be played back indefinitely.
- A total of 14 offensive and defensive passive skills that can be level-up with special resources
- 10 fun songs background music composed by Zeta Heo
- An infinite combination of space ship and skill that can break through difficult difficulty
